name: CrazyFun
description:
A Game where you happily commit mass murder. You place portals that spawn cute terrified blob people. You upgrade your weapon. 

You will end up chaotically swirling your mouse to kill each and every one of them.

Author's note: Hey :) This is the first game I've ever published (yayyyy). Hope you guys like it. 

ps: I'd love to hear your advice/opinions.
